ComicInfo.Series: Sherlock Frankenstein and the Legion of Evil
ComicInfo.Summary: Part One: Whatever Happened to Sherlock Frankenstein?: Ten years after the disappearance of a group of heroes, Black Hammer's daughter Lucy tries to find out what happened. She tracks down the associate of a villain also present, Sherlock Frankenstein.
ComicInfo.Title: Part One: Whatever Happened to Sherlock Frankenstein?
